docs.lead_paragraph: The Health Department was authorized yesterday to remove drugs from boarded-up pharmacies that were vandalized during recent rioting, and to store them for safekeeping.

headline.main: CITY TO CLEAR OUT LOOTED PHARMACIES

docs.abstract: Health Dept authorized to remove drugs from pharmacies looted during recent riots and to store drugs for safekeeping
docs.snippet: The Health Department was authorized yesterday to remove drugs from boarded-up pharmacies that were vandalized during recent rioting, and to store them for safekeeping.
